title: Example FMEA - Power Window Motor
scope: Power window motor assembly including armature, housing, gear train, and electrical connector. Excludes window regulator and switch.

failure_modes.function: Convert electrical energy to rotational torque per specification (≥2.5 Nm at 12V)
failure_modes.failure_mode: Motor does not operate - no rotation
failure_modes.effect: Window inoperable; customer must manually close window; vehicle cannot be secured properly
failure_modes.cause: Armature windings open circuit due to wire fatigue from vibration
failure_modes.prevention_controls: Wire gauge specified per load calculation; vibration analysis during design validation
failure_modes.detection_controls: Functional test 100%; continuity test at end of line
failure_modes.recommended_action: Add wire anchor at commutator to prevent fatigue from vibration

failure_modes.function: Convert electrical energy to rotational torque per specification (≥2.5 Nm at 12V)
failure_modes.failure_mode: Motor does not operate - no rotation
failure_modes.effect: Window inoperable; customer must manually close window; vehicle cannot be secured properly
failure_modes.cause: Connector terminal backed out from housing
failure_modes.prevention_controls: Terminal retention feature in design; insertion force specification
failure_modes.detection_controls: Pull test at assembly; functional test 100%
failure_modes.recommended_action: Increase terminal lance feature depth by 0.5mm

failure_modes.function: Operate continuously within speed range (50-80 RPM no-load)
failure_modes.effect: Window stops mid-travel; customer dissatisfied; potential safety issue if window cannot close
failure_modes.cause: Brush wear excessive due to commutator surface roughness
failure_modes.prevention_controls: Brush material specification; brush spring force requirement; commutator surface finish spec
failure_modes.detection_controls: Durability test 100K cycles; brush length inspection at assembly
failure_modes.recommended_action: Increase brush length by 2mm for additional wear margin

failure_modes.function: Operate continuously within speed range (50-80 RPM no-load)
failure_modes.failure_mode: Motor speed too slow - below 50 RPM
failure_modes.effect: Window closes slowly; customer annoyance; minor inconvenience
failure_modes.cause: Bearing drag due to improper lubrication quantity
failure_modes.prevention_controls: Lubricant specification; quantity controlled via automated dispenser
failure_modes.detection_controls: Speed test at EOL; torque test

failure_modes.effect: Circuit protection trips; window inoperable; potential harness damage if sustained; customer stranded
failure_modes.cause: Armature windings shorted turn-to-turn due to insulation breakdown from thermal stress
failure_modes.prevention_controls: Insulation class H specified; maximum temperature design calculation validated
failure_modes.detection_controls: Thermal test at rated load; insulation resistance test; hi-pot test
failure_modes.recommended_action: Add thermal cutoff device (TCO) to motor assembly

failure_modes.function: Maintain electrical continuity through connector under vibration
failure_modes.failure_mode: Connector fretting corrosion causes high resistance
failure_modes.effect: Motor runs slow or intermittent; increased circuit heating; potential connector failure
failure_modes.cause: Micro-motion at contact interface due to insufficient normal force
failure_modes.prevention_controls: Contact force specification; gold plating on contacts; sealed connector design
failure_modes.detection_controls: Contact resistance measurement; vibration endurance test

failure_modes.function: Transmit torque through gear train without excessive noise
failure_modes.effect: Customer complaint; perceived poor quality; warranty claim
failure_modes.cause: Gear tooth profile deviation from specification
failure_modes.prevention_controls: Gear profile tolerance specification; process capability requirement Cpk>1.67
failure_modes.detection_controls: Noise test at EOL; gear inspection sampling

failure_modes.function: Protect internal components from moisture ingress
failure_modes.effect: Corrosion of internal components; eventual motor failure; loss of function; customer stranded
failure_modes.cause: Housing seal degradation from UV exposure and temperature cycling
failure_modes.prevention_controls: UV-resistant seal material; seal compression specification; housing design with drip shield
failure_modes.detection_controls: Water ingress test per IP67; accelerated aging test
failure_modes.recommended_action: Add secondary seal lip for redundancy
